summary: Pledging to keep herself from being the oldest and the only woman in her entire family never to wed, Montana embarks on a thirty-day, thirty-thousand-mile expedition to charm a potential suitor into becoming her fiancé.
cast: Paula Patton|Derek Luke|Taye Diggs|Boris Kodjoe|Trey Songz|Jill Scott|Adam Brody|Jenifer Lewis|Djimon Hounsou|Lauren London|Christina Milian|Tia Mowry-Hardrict|La La Anthony|Rickey Smiley|Thomas Miles|Ned Beatty|Sandra Beatty|Terrence Jenkins|Affion Crockett|Lyn Sisson-Talbert|Tara Batesole|Magda Harout|Jazmyn Simon|Gregory Vahanian|Tyler Lepley|Diondre Jones|Dillon Wayne Abbott|Tyler Garnett|Juliannah Richmond|Bill Lee Brown|Antonio Gomez|Madison|Randall J. Bacon|Shakana Beatty|Julie Berlin|Andrew Blood|Tiberius Bright|Jeff T. title: Ligera de equipaje
